start: 👋 Hello, {username} This is a bot for working with current neural network models in Telegram. Commands: /start - restart /reset - clear history /models - select neural network /agents - manage agents /profile - user profile /invite - invite friends /help - help To start using the neural network, simply type text and send it to the bot. It will use the model you have selected.
profile: 👤 Your profile ID: {user_id} Balance: {balance} Current model: {current_model} 🤖 Chat mode: {current_mode} 📝 Messages in history: {history_count}
help: About the bot The bot works through official APIs. We provide 10 free requests that renew daily. Limits To maintain stable operation without overloads, we use generation limits. Context The bot saves the context of the last 5 messages. To reset the context, use the /reset command.
